name: Salamangreat Reincarnation
text: Select 1 monster you control whose original name is "Salamangreat Heatleo" or "Salamangreat Sunlight Wolf" and has the same name as a monster in your Graveyard. That monster is treated as having been Link Summoned using a monster with the same name as its material. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
